name: Kit's Quest (Demo)
description:
Jump into your next great adventure in this challenging, fun-filled 3D platformer!

In this demo, you'll get a taste of Kit's full adventure, coming to Steam in the summer of 2023. Don't forget to Wishlist Kit's Quest on Steam if you want to check out the full experience!

Explore a huge, interconnected world…   from an abandoned mine deep underground, to colourful treehouses high up in a forest canopy!

Collect magical dragon teeth and anything else you can get your paws on to help make headway on your quest!

Overcome all sorts of challenges, whether you need to use cool abilities, puzzle-solving skills, or platforming prowess.

Find friends to help you on your way…

…and some not-so-nice critters, too.

Beyond the Demo

If you want to play the huge full game when it comes out in the summer of 2023, don't forget to Wishlist Kit's Quest on Steam!

To get involved with the community, join the Kit's Quest Discord Server!

For release news and more, you can check out KitsQuest.com, or follow LoneFoxGames on Twitter and Facebook!

And, finally, any feedback is super valuable and appreciated! Please feel free to comment below or email Feedback@KitsQuest.com.
